description:
Hostelworld will host a meetup to discuss relevant tech topics, networking and have fun! Four Hostelworld speakers will be engaging with the audience alongside great food and drinks. 
# Agenda 
– 18h 30 – Welcome Drink 
– 19h15 – “Text Me (Messaging and microservices)” by Hugo Valente 
– 19h45 – “Know your user” by Maísa Carvalho 
– 20h15 – Pause for enjoying a delicious variety of snacks 
– 20h45 – “What the f*** does a QA?” by Pedro Tavares 
– 21h15 – “Deep Learning: How does it work?” by Samir Antônio 
– 21h45 – End
name: Hostelworld Tech Talks
